html:
Name

Code

Description

Get current date/time

GetCurrentDateTime

Gets values of the current date and time in the UTC zone and the time zone offset of the user.

Get Dates Difference

DateDiff

Gets difference between 2 days, in seconds.

Get current user info

GetCurrentUserInfo

Gets information about current user: Full name, job title, Phone, ID.

Retrieve entity contextual data

RetrieveEntityData

Queries contextual data for the specified entity.

Get Entity Structure

GetEntityStructure

Gets entity structure and returns the list of entity columns.

Search Entities

SearchEntities

Global search for Creatio records using keywords. Supports filters by entity schema name.

Get Indexed Entities

GetIndexedEntities

Gets a list of entity names that are indexed by global search.

Get Documents Content (SourceCode action)

GetDocumentsContent

Code-based source code system action that enables developers to get content of text file documents.
